ドラ１・西が仮契約「前田健太投手のようになりたい」契約金１億円、年俸１２００万

04 Nov 2019

　阪神からドラフト１位指名された西純矢投手（１８）＝創志学園＝が４日、岡山県岡山市内のホテルで入団交渉に臨み、契約金１億円プラス出来高払い３０００万円、年俸１２００万円で仮契約した。高卒１年目から破格の待遇となった。（金額は推定）
　阪神に入る実感が高まった。「仮契約が終わって、だんだんと実感が湧いてきて、プロ野球選手としてのスタートを切る所まできたのかな」と話す。阪神のイメージは「常勝軍団」。そんな中で先発完投型の投手にこだわりたいと改めて意気込みを口にしていた。
　契約金の使い道を問われ「弟が高校に入学するので、家族に当てはめたらいい」と家族思いの一面を見せた。
　広島出身だけに幼い頃から広島カープの試合を見ており、目指すのは元広島カープで現ドジャースの前田健太投手。「小さい時からの憧れである前田健太投手のようになりたい」。甲子園でも“マエケン”ばりの熱投を見せていきたい。

Dora 1 / Nishi has provisional contract "I want to be like Kenta Maeda" contract amount 100 million yen, annual salary 12 million

04 Nov 2019

Hanshin ’s No. 1 draft pitcher (18) = Soshi Gakuen = was drafted by a hotel in Okayama City, Okayama Prefecture on the 4th. I made a temporary contract for 10,000 yen. It became exceptional treatment from the first year of high school. (The amount is estimated)
The feeling of entering Hanshin has increased. "I wonder if the temporary contract is over and I feel that I'm starting to feel like I'm starting my career as a professional baseball player." The image of Hanshin is “Tsunatsu Corps”. Under such circumstances, he once again expressed his enthusiasm to be particular about starting pitchers.
When asked how to use the contract money, he showed one aspect of his family feeling, “Your brother will enter high school, so you should apply it to your family.”
Since I was only a native of Hiroshima, I have been watching Hiroshima Carp games since I was a child, and my goal is for former Hiroshima Carp pitcher Kenta Maeda. “I want to be like Kenta Maeda, a longing from a small age.” I want to show the heat of “Maeken” in Koshien.
